forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this morning with overcast skies during the afternoon hours. High 14C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain ending for the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending early. Remaining cloudy. High 14C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 48F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 12C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High near 55F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 55F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 48F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 12C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 54F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early. Partial clearing late. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy after some evening light rain. Low 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 14C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 58F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 6C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 44F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 16C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 62F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 7C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 46F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 18C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 64F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 7C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 47F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 18C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 64F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.
